name: Microbattle/Fullspeed
description:
This is a collection of two not separately released games:
  • Microbattle is a game for two players. Each one controls a virus and tries to shoot the other player while other viruses float around and obfuscate the shots. This all takes place inside a human's body with a respective background image.

  • Fullspeed is a simple racing game against the time. It takes place on a highway with six lanes which is shown in a top-down perspective. The player can control the speed and needs to dodge slower vehicles by moving left and right.
